name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SMS Appointment Reminders Link Launch Utility

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web quick link utility to access web pages of our SMS Appointment Reminders. More information visit us at http://www.ratsvoip.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web quick link utility to access web pages of our SMS Appointment Reminders.
This utility allows you to easily access the links to our online appointment reminder web program.
Allowing faster access to the links, and without the need to access or saving bookmarks to utilize the program.
The appointment reminder program, allows you to send both sms text and email reminders to your clients of upcoming appointments.
These links are to our Appointment Reminders, Login, Client, and Upcoming Appointment areas. Also a link is included to our home page as well. This link launch add-on is only beneficial to those that have signed up for our SMS Appointment reminders, "see below link".
To signup or more information for RATSVoIP Reminders visit us at http://www.ratsvoip.com
